articles.author: ROD MCGUIRK Associated Press
articles.title: Doctor accused of secretly recording 4,500 videos in Australian hospital restrooms released on bail - ABC News
articles.description: A trainee surgeon in Australia has been released on bail after being charged with secretly recording hundreds of medical colleagues in hospital restrooms
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia -- A trainee surgeon was released from custody on bail Friday after he was charged with secretly video recording hundreds of medical colleagues in the restrooms of Australian hos… [+2080 chars]
